description: This file defines the TemplateEngine class, which provides functionality for loading and processing templates using the FreeMarker library. It includes methods for rendering templates as strings or writing them directly to files, and initializes a static Configuration instance with specific settings.

classes.name: TemplateEngine
classes.description: A singleton class that manages template processing using FreeMarker. It initializes a static configuration for template loading, encoding, and error handling, and provides methods for rendering templates to strings or files.

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description: Returns the singleton instance of the TemplateEngine class.

methods.name: loadClasspathTemplate
methods.description: Loads a template from the classpath, processes it with the provided model, and returns the result as a string.

methods.name: writeClasspathTemplate
methods.description: Processes a classpath template with the provided model and writes the output to the specified file.
